data.title: Alchetron, The Free Social Encyclopedia
data.meta_description: Shunsuke Kazama ( , Kazama Shunsuke, born June 17, 1983 in Sumida, Tokyo) is a Japanese voice actor, actor, and singer affiliated with Johnny  Associates. As a Johnny's Junior he was member of Four Tops. He is also a member of TUYU along with V6's Hiroshi Nagano, NEWS's Takahisa Masuda, Hey S
data.text:
History

As a Johnny's Junior he was member of Four Tops.

He is also a member of TU→YU along with V6's Hiroshi Nagano, NEWS's Takahisa Masuda, Hey! Say! JUMP's Hikaru Yaotome and actor Tatsuya Takeda.

He starred in the feature-length film Maebashi Visual Kei, as a young farmer who tries to make it big in a visual kei band.

Films

Black Widow Business (2016)

Neko nanka yondemo konai (2016)

Television

Akihabara@Deep (xxxx) - Page

San nen B-gumi Kinpachi-sensei 5 (xxxx) - Kenjiro Kanesue

Jun to Ai (xxxx) - Itoshi Machida

Suzuki Sensei (xxxx) - Yuji Katsuno

Rikuō (2017) - Tarō Sakamoto

Animation

Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters (xxxx) - Yugi Mutou/Yami Yugi

Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX (xxxx) - Yugi Mutou/Yami Yugi

10th Anniversary Yu-Gi-Oh! Movie: Super Fusion! Bonds That Transcended Time (xxxx) - Yugi Mutou/Yami Yugi

From Up On Poppy Hill (xxxx) - Shirō Mizunuma & Hiroshi Tachibana.

Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Dark Side of Dimensions (xxxx) - Yugi Mutou

Awards

3rd Nikkan Sports Drama Grand Prix (April 1999 - March 2000) - Best Newcomer (3 nen B gumi Kinpachi Sensei 5)

70th Television Drama Academy Awards (2011-Nov-09) - Best Supporting Actor (Soredemo, Ikite Yuku)
